question: Which country does not share a border with Benin?
explanation: Cameroon does not share a border with Benin. Four nations shares border with Benin. Togo lies to the west of Benin. Burkina Faso lies to the north-west of Benin. Nigeria lies to the east of Benin. Niger lies to the north-east of Benin. South of Benin faces the Bight of Benin, a part of the Gulf of Guinea in the Atlantic Ocean.
